Union_City.Bruriah High School for Girls: The Bruriah High School for Girls is a six-year yeshiva school for girls located in Elizabeth, in Union County, New Jersey, United States, serving students in seventh through twelfth grades. Throughout the day the student curriculum consists of Judaic and secular studies. The school is part of the Jewish Educational Center, which is run by its dean, Rabbi Elazar Mayer Teitz.
